examples.korean: Her styles are always up to the minute. 발음듣기 그녀의 스타일은 항상 최첨단이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her styles are always up to the minute. 발음

examples.korean: at the leading edge of scientific research 발음듣기 과학 연구의 최첨단에(서) Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: People always fear change. People feared electricity when it was invented, didn't they? People feared coal, they feared gas-powered engines... There will always be ignorance, and ignorance leads to fear. But with time, people will come to accept their silicon masters. (Bill Gates) 발음듣기 사람들은 늘 변화를 두려워한다. 전기가 발명되었을 때도 두려워하지 않았나? 석탄도 두려워했고, 가스엔진도 두려워했다. 사람들은 언제나 무지할 것이고, 바로 이러한 무지가 두려움이 된다. 하지만 시간이 지남에 따라 사람들은 최첨단 기술 전문가들을 받아들이게 될 것이다. (빌 게이츠, 지혜명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: People always fear change. People feared electricity when it was invented, didn't they? People feared coal, they feared gas-powered engines... There will always be ignorance, and ignorance leads to fear. But with time, people will come to accept their silicon masters. (Bill Gates) 발음
